conversations.body_text: Hi Alejandro Cordero,     Yes, we have arranged for your order to be dispatched from our US warehouse. We apologise for not updating you promptly. Here is your tracking link:  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ201H40338189505

No problem, thank you for the update.

On Thu, Oct 16, 2025, 11:18 PM service@simsonn.com
